resources.string: Login or Register to start keeping all of your passwords safe and in one place!

This application is designed to store all passwords that you cannot keep no longer in your head! No more notes scattered around your home, no more remembering all the digits and special characters! Now, thanks to KeepMyPassword you can store all your passwords in ONE place completly for free!
Is it secure to store my passwords in this app?

Yes! All paswords are encrypted and securely stored. There is a little chance for hackers to break into database and steal valuable informations. Even if someone would like to break into database, everyones passwords will be imidietely deleted.
What if I do not have stable internet connection?

Do not worry. This app is being developed towards working both in online and offline mode. When you are online, your data is passed to online server. When you are out of internet connection all passwords will be stored in local version of database on your device, but some options like Deleting your Account will require to be online.

My name is Adrian Goral. I am 19 years old and I am from Poland. I am passionate about software developing and I want to connect my future with it. Feel free to visit my GitHub page: https://github.com/xEdziu
You can contact me via email: adrian.goral@gmail.com or you can find me on Discord: xEdziu#2123
